turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing an order at Bella Luna pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what did you want to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have two medium pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, what kind of crust did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what would you like for the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a chicken barbecue pizza for the first one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And for the second, can I have a chicken Alfredo pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, it doesn't look like bella luna carries alfredo sauce at the moment. did you want another option?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, okay. Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Instead, let's do just sausage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: green peppers and onions

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. the total for 2 medium pizzas, both with thick crust, 1 bbq chicken and 1 with sausage, green peppers, and onions is $28.90.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order for pick up now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that'd be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. did you need anything else from me?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That was all I needed. Thank you so much for your help today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're very welcome. the order will be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you so much.
